attributes.additional_details:
WE LIVE IN A SMALL COUNTRY. ENGLAND IS CRAZY TO HAVE SO MANY MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT. MY PROPOSAL IS THE MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF MPs IS 59. IRISH, WELSH AND SCOTTISH MPs ARE NOT ALLOWED TO VOTE ON ENGLISH MATTERS (Just as English MPs are not allowed to vote on Irish, Scottish and Welsh matters).
IF WE GET ONLY 59 MAXIMUM MPs (I hope all English). THEN WE CAN ABOLISH EXPENSES AND PAY £95,000.00 PER ANNUM. (What a wage for a job they love doing). IT'S NOT LIKE WORK, AND THINK OF THE PENSION £££££££$$$$$$££££.
